name: Marinated Fried Fish
author: terrylynne
summary: This is a simple and flavorful fish dish.
ingredients: ¼ teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste
directions: Place flounder fillets in a small glass dish
Mix lemon juice, garlic, cumin, and paprika in a small bowl; pour over flounder fillets
Cover dish with plastic wrap and marinate flounder in refrigerator for 2 hours
Mix flour, dill weed, and cayenne pepper together on a piece of waxed paper
Beat egg and water together in a wide bowl
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Gently press the flounder fillets into the flour mixture to coat; shake to remove excess flour
Dip into the beaten egg to coat and immediately return to the flour mixture to coat
Fry flounder in hot oil until the fish flakes easily with a fork, about 5 minutes per side
